metadata.title: CVE-2024-56754 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: caam - Fix the pointer passed to caam_qi_shutdown()The type of the last parameter given to devm_add_action_or_reset() is"struct caam_drv_private *", but in caam_qi_shutdown(), it is casted to"struct device *".Pass the correct parameter to devm_add_action_or_reset() so that theresources are released as expected.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
